title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 536.3 - Penalties and interest for fraud
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 536.3 - Penalties and interest for fraud

State Regulations

Tax Law, ยง 1145(a)(2)

When the failure to pay or pay over any tax to the

Department of Taxation and Finance within the time required is due to fraud, in
lieu of the penalties and interest provided for in section
536.1
(a) and
(b) of this Part, the penalty and interest
prescribed in section
1145 (a)(2)
of the Tax Law
shall be added to the tax. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
ยง
536.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
